meanings.sent1: The soldiers loaded the materiel onto the trucks for the mission.
meanings.sent2: The army base stored a vast amount of materiel for emergencies.
meanings.sent3: The materiel decided to play hide and seek with the soldiers, causing a delay.
meanings.sent4: The materiel was the backbone of the army, ensuring their strength in battle.
meanings.sent5: The shiny materiel gleamed under the sun, ready for action.

meanings.definition: The materials and equipment used in various activities.
meanings.sent1: The construction workers gathered the necessary materiel to build the new house.
meanings.sent2: The camping trip required a lot of materiel such as tents and cooking supplies.
meanings.sent3: The materiel in the art class seemed to have a mind of its own, jumping around.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity soared as she used the materiel to craft a beautiful masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The materiel for the science experiment was carefully selected for accuracy.
